ResourceHeader.ResourceName: KITDALEN: ULF Photometer Ground Based Data (PostScripts)
ResourceHeader.Description: This dataset contains spectrograms plots of the photometer device located at Kitdalen, pointing to the Zenith, for detection of auroral fluctuations. At the bottom of figure, the curve shows the integrated power on the 0.1 – 11.63 frequency range. No units are given.
